title: Simplify Courier App order actions to Delete and Deliver only

requirements.text: In `frontend/src/components/OrderCard.tsx` and `frontend/src/pages/CourierApp.tsx`, remove all intermediate status action buttons (Accept, Preparing, Out for Delivery) from each order card. Each order card must display exactly two action buttons: (1) **Deliver** — calls `updateOrderStatus` to set the order status directly to `delivered`, and (2) **Delete** — shows a confirmation prompt then calls `useDeleteOrder`. No other status-advancement controls should be present.

quotes: remove all the prep stages and only keep delete, change it to deliver

acceptanceCriteria: Each order card in the Courier App shows exactly two action buttons: 'Deliver' and 'Delete'.
Clicking 'Deliver' marks the order as 'delivered' by calling the appropriate backend mutation.
Clicking 'Delete' shows a confirmation prompt; on confirmation, calls useDeleteOrder and the order disappears from the dashboard.
No 'Accept', 'Preparing', 'Out for Delivery', or any other intermediate status buttons are rendered on any order card.
The Deliver button is styled with the app's white and orange (#F97316) theme.
The Delete button is styled consistently with the app's white and orange (#F97316) theme.

requirements.text: In `frontend/src/components/OrderFilters.tsx`, remove filter tabs for `accepted`, `preparing`, and `out_for_delivery` statuses. The filter bar must only show tabs relevant to the simplified workflow: `pending`, `delivered`, and `cancelled` (plus an 'All' option).

quotes: remove all the prep stages and only keep delete, change it to deliver

acceptanceCriteria: The order filter bar in the Courier App does not show 'Accepted', 'Preparing', or 'Out for Delivery' filter tabs.
Filter tabs present are: All, Pending, Delivered, and Cancelled.
Per-status counts in the filter bar reflect only the visible statuses.

constraints: Do not change the backend order status data model — 'delivered' must remain a valid status value.
Do not remove the Delete order functionality.
The PIN-based access gate (PIN: 1953) must remain intact and unchanged.
The Menu Management section must remain intact and unchanged.
nonGoals: Changing the Customer Portal in any way.
Removing or modifying the backend `updateOrderStatus` or `deleteOrder` functions.
Adding any new order statuses or workflow stages.
